message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take 60%, you take 40%.
Alice, your offer was a bit too greedy for my liking. Let's be fair, I'll take a slight majority and we can both leave with a good chunk of money.
Okay Bob, let's meet in the middle. I'll take slightly less than my initial offer.
Alice, time is running out! This is a good deal, let's take it and not risk ending up with nothing.
Bob, I'm compromising again.  This is a fair deal considering the time pressure. Let's close this out.
Alice, this back and forth is pointless.  I'm giving you a chance to take a good amount before inflation eats away at it further. Don't be greedy!
